1.20.1.20.1.1.0: Add Oculus warning screen. Compatible with SereneSeasons for Fabric. Fix Done button disappearing from screen. Add snowball and slime ball particles. Optimize performance. Add FBPRainParticle transparency adjustment option. Add FBPCampfireSmokeParticle. Fix flame particles not spawning while frozen. Add FBPSnowParticle water physics. Particle physics improvements. Fix shaders incompatibility. Code cleanup & improvements. Add FBPDripParticle. Add block placing animation. Fix incorrect lighting of FBPTerrainParticle
1.20.1.20.1.0.2-beta: Fix crash when config file is corrupt
1.20.1.20.1.0.1-beta: Fix a crash on Freeze effect
1.20.1.1.1.2.0-beta: Add option to disable block breaking particles
1.20.1.1.1.1.1-beta: Fix FBP Options Menu doesn't fix on the screen
1.20.1.1.1.1.0-beta: Fix the position of the Done button. Add particle culling toggle option
1.20.1.1.1.0.2-beta: [Forge] Fix unexpected Snow Particles in the desert
